meanings.definition: To make use of or apply for a particular purpose or task.
meanings.sent1: She was employing her artistic skills to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The company is employing new technology to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: By employing her creativity, she turned a simple idea into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: He was employing all his strength to lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent5: Employing determination, she overcame all obstacles to reach her goal.

meanings.definition: To hire or engage the services of someone for work.
meanings.sent1: The company is employing new staff to handle the increased workload.
meanings.sent2: She is employing a professional chef for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: Employing a magician for the party was a surprising but fun idea.
meanings.sent4: He is employing a personal trainer to help him get in shape.
meanings.sent5: By employing skilled workers, the project was completed ahead of schedule.

meanings.sent1: The children were employing themselves with coloring books.
meanings.sent2: She was employing her time by learning a new language.
meanings.sent3: Employing herself with puzzles, she forgot about the time.
meanings.sent4: He was employing his mind with challenging riddles.
meanings.sent5: By employing various activities, she kept herself entertained during the long wait.
